trigger.match: ^Slashing viciously at you\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) rends you in the (chest|gut|head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) with (.+?)\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_nekai__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slices .+? (?:with|in) the Angknek style through your (left|right) (arm|leg)\, the pain making you slow and weak\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angknek_limb__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gouges .+? (?:with|in) the Angknek style into your gut\, spilling your steaming entrails\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angknek_gut__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) punctures .+? into your chest (?:with|in) the Angknek style\, and a sharp pain streaks across your lungs\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angknek_chest__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slashes .+? into your head (?:with|in) the Angknek style\, adorning your cheek with a gash of crimson\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angknek_head__

trigger.match: ^With a hiss\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) slams [hH](?:is|er) nekai against your throat and presses against your windpipe\, painfully choking the life from you\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_oothai__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slashes your (chest|gut|head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) with such force that the blades warble\, creating an earsplitting screech that whistles through the air\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_kaife__

trigger.match: ^Graceful as a scorpion\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) leaps in from the \w+ with a vicious cry\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_scorpionstrike__

trigger.match: ^Filled with disgust\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) spits directly in your face\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_spit__

trigger.match: ^Twirling .+?\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) shreds your (left|right) (arm|leg) (?:with|in) the Angkai style\, sending piercing pain through your nerves\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angkai_limb__

trigger.match: ^(?:With|In) the Angkai style\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) plunges .+? into your head\, painfully gouging out your (left|right) eye\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angkai_head__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slices .+? through your chest (?:with|in) the Angkai style\, and you suddenly have trouble breathing\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angkai_chest__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) shreds .+? across your gut in a vicious Angkai arc\, painfully traumatizing your liver\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angkai_gut__

trigger.match: Speedy as a crouching scorpion\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) twists back violently and sends you sprawling\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_scorpiontail__

trigger.match: ^With a sudden strike\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) skewers you with two nekais in the (chest|head|gut|left arm|right arm)\, holding you in place\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_ootangk__

trigger.match: ^Leaping up and twisting in the air\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) smashes [hH](?:is|er) (?:left|right) foot into your (chest|gut|head|left arm|right arm)\, which trembles from the force of the kick\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_sprongk__

trigger.match: ^Throwing a kick in the Spronghai style\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) slams [hH](?:is|er) (?:left|right) heel on your (chest|gut|head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg)\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_spronghai__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) cuts .+? with an Angkhai arc into your (chest|gut|head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg)\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angkhai__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gracefully cuts (.+?) across your head with an Angkhai arc\, slicing open your throat in three crimson streaks\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angkhai_head__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) rips .+? through your (left|right) leg tendon in an Angkhai arc\, leaving you crippled\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_angkhai_leg__

trigger.match: ^Twisting in a circle\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) plunges .+? into your gut\, driving the foot so hard that it snaps your spine\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_sprongma_gut__

trigger.match: ^Twisting in a circle\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) plunges .+? into your chest\, smashing your chest inward\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_sprongma_chest__

trigger.match: ^Fountains of blood erupt as ([A-Z][a-z]+) neatly removes [hH](?:is|er) blades from your (chest|gut|head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg)\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_amihai__

trigger.match: ^Hooding [hH](?:is|er) eyes and letting out a low hiss\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) spins around with such speed that (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e becomes a blur\,? and then suddenly kicks you in the (head|chest|gut|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg)\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_finalsting__

trigger.match: ^Your (\w+) starts to throb(?:\, and blood trickles out of your \1)?\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_kaiga__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) (arm|leg) snaps painfully\.$
trigger.name: nekotai_oriama1__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) (arm|leg) is mangled into a twisted mass of bloody\, broken bone\!$
trigger.name: nekotai_oriama2__
